sys_ux_client_script.name: Parse extraParams to state parameters

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_5c08dac11b20b1500f0eda43cc4bcb03
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Sales Order Case">9c0892c11b20b1500f0eda43cc4bcb5f</macroponent><name>Parse extraParams to state parameters</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    const extraParams = api.context.props.extraParams;
    if (extraParams) {
        let extraParamsProp = {};

        //extraParams is generated as a fixed formated string such as: 'query/parent=b424cd23c322310015519f2974d3aeed'
        const propsArray = extraParams.split("/");
        for (let i = 0; i < propsArray.length; i += 2) {
            extraParamsProp[propsArray[i]] = propsArray[i + 1];
        }
        api.setState("extraParamsProp", extraParamsProp);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>TBlev1</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-07 18:25:58</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>5c08dac11b20b1500f0eda43cc4bcb03</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Parse extraParams to state parameters</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Insight Process Management" source="x_snc_insight_pr_0">39bd5e9747f05510ab51f109536d431c</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Insight Process Management">39bd5e9747f05510ab51f109536d431c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_5c08dac11b20b1500f0eda43cc4bcb03</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>TBlev1</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-07 18:25:58</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
